report.title: Auto-checked verification data
report.description: List of occurrences for verification with support for mapping the occurrences and the verification check system.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences xo ON xo.id=o.id AND xo.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id LEFT JOIN samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vuser JOIN sample_attributes sauser on sauser.id=vuser.sample_attribute_id and sauser.deleted=false and sauser.system_function = 'cms_username' ) on vuser.sample_id =o.id and vuser.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vuserp JOIN sample_attributes sauserp on sauserp.id=vuserp.sample_attribute_id and sauserp.deleted=false and sauserp.system_function = 'cms_username' ) on vuserp.sample_id =sparent.id and vuserp.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users ouser ON ouser.id=o.created_by_id AND ouser.id<>1 -- don't return records allocated by default to admin user LEFT JOIN occurrence_comments oc ON oc.occurrence_id=o.id AND oc.implies_manual_check_required=true AND oc.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ('#records#' = 'all' OR ('#records#' IN ('unverified','fail') AND xo.record_status IN ('C','S')) OR ('#records#'='verified' AND xo.record_status='V') OR ('#records#'='dubious' AND xo.record_status='D') OR ('#records#'='rejected' AND xo.record_status='R')) AND (o.certainty = 'C' or o.certainty is null) AND ('#records#'<>'fail' OR oc.occurrence_id is not null) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(s.geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: records
param.lookup_values: unverified:All unverified records,fail:Unverified records failing automated checks,verified:All verified records,dubious:All dubious records,rejected:All rejected records,all:All records

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: expertise_location
param.description: Provide the location in which your expertise applies
param.join: JOIN locations lexpert ON st_intersects(lexpert.boundary_geom, s.geom) AND lexpert.id=#expertise_location#

param.name: expertise_taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs which the user has expertise in
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tg ON tg.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tg.id IN (#expertise_taxon_groups#)

param.name: expertise_surveys
param.description: Comma separated list of surveys IDs to include
param.join: JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false and su.id in (#expertise_surveys#)

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: strokecolor
column.sql: case xo.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fillcolor
column.sql: case xo.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end

column.name: pass
column.sql:
CASE WHEN oc.id IS NULL THEN '
